resources.string: Select and upload at least 10 high-quality, clear photos of yourself (ideally 15â€“20) from your gallery. Choose images with varied angles, different lighting conditions, and simple, solid-colored clothing. Make sure you are the only person in each photo, keep the background uncluttered, and include natural, relaxed expressions.
Problem connecting with server. Please check your connection.
Oops! It looks like you need to upload at least 10 photos before training your model. Try taking some selfies in portrait mode from different angles to get started.
This process usually takes about an hour, so feel free to close the app and check back later.
